products.title: Bags
products.description: Elevate your daywear style with our collection of handbags, tote bags and shoulder bag. Cross body bags transition effortlessly from AM to PM. Downsize to a clutch or mini bag for your evening ensemble.

products.title: Cloths
products.description: Clothing (also known as clothes, apparel, and attire) are items worn on the body. Typically, clothing is made of fabrics or textiles, but over time it has included garments made from animal skin and other thin sheets of materials and natural products found in the environment, put together

products.title: colors
products.description: Colours result from the electromagnetic radiation of a range of wavelengths that are visible to the eye. The three characteristics of hue, saturation, and brightness are commonly used to distinguish one colour from another.
